snippet.title: Where in the World is Carmen Sandiego (1996) full playing 20th Play-a-versary Special
snippet.description:
Okay this took alot less time than I thought it was going to take, so this marks 20 years since I first played this iteration of Where in the World is Carmen Sandiego (because if I recall correctly it was close to Remembrance day)

Granted this is the Learning Company Rerelease of the game though

Also it's a good thing I didn't do a commentary otherwise I would be singing Dancing in the Moonlight alot and we would have the Muppets to thank for that

I did a review for this game on 

https://www.vizzed.com/games/where-in-the-world-is-carmen-sandiego-(1999)-pc-windows-84737-game
